mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.orderno AS "orderno", a.expect_date AS "expectDate", a.real_date AS "realDate", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.firmware AS "firmware", a.product_name AS "productName", a.bom AS "bom", a.pcb AS "pcb"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM board_order a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.create_by = #{createBy.id}
AND to_char(a.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=to_char(#{startdate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND to_char(a.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=to_char(#{enddate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND a.firmware LIKE '%'||#{firmware}||'%' '%'+#{firmware}+'%' concat('%',#{firmware},'%')
AND a.product_name LIKE '%'||#{productName}||'%' '%'+#{productName}+'%' concat('%',#{productName},'%')
AND a.bom LIKE '%'||#{bom}||'%' '%'+#{bom}+'%' concat('%',#{bom},'%')
AND a.pcb LIKE '%'||#{pcb}||'%' '%'+#{pcb}+'%' concat('%',#{pcb},'%')
AND (${sqlstr})
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_order( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, orderno, expect_date, real_date, quantity, remarks, firmware, product_name, bom, pcb ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orderNo}, #{expectDate}, #{realDate}, #{quantity}, #{remarks}, #{firmware}, #{productName}, #{bom}, #{pcb} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_order SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, orderno = #{orderNo}, expect_date = #{expectDate}, real_date = #{realDate}, quantity = #{quantity}, remarks = #{remarks}, firmware = #{firmware}, product_name = #{productName}, bom = #{bom}, pcb = #{pcb} WHERE id = #{id}
